scripts.say: After sailing a bit further, the fleet reached the naval base at the Aleutian defense line.
Commander, and my friends from the Eagle Union, welcome to the Aleutian defense line.
ЗДравствуйте, Commander. It's been a while~
Huh? Avrora? Weren't you in charge of securing aid and supplies between the Royal Navy?
Hehe, I assume that this is your first time visiting the Northern Parliament. I thought it'd be appropriate for me to greet you here.
After all, I will be supporting your forces in the upcoming operation.
Ahaha! We're going to need all the good help we can get for a large operation like this!
That's right~ Now, I'd like to introduce Pamiat Merkuria, one of the fellow members of the Northern Parliament.
This is my first time meeting all of you, right? I'm the light cruiser, Pamiat Merkuria. Nice to meet you~!
Huh? Oooh~ So you're the legendary commander who led the defense of NY Harbor? Mmm~ hmm~ Not bad, not bad.
I heard that last time, you were viciously attacked as soon as you arrived at port and didn't even have a chance to catch a breath. How awful of them, hehe~

options.content: How can you be sure that they won't take the initiative?
Has the stronghold been here for a while?

scripts.say: But don't worry, that won't happen here. That snowy stronghold over there won't attack until we get within a certain distance, so there's no chance of them launching an offensive here.
Well, we've never observed any attacks from the stronghold outside of a certain range. That's why it's largely been overlooked as a low-threat target.
As long as I can remember. It appeared shortly after the end of that war, and has remained here since then.

Even though we've tried our hand at attacking it in the past, we've never been able to spare enough forces to actually make a dent. Regrettably, we are quite ashamed about how little progress we've been able to make...
Don't worry about it! See, you have backup now~!
Yo, Commander! I'm glad you finally made it. I've been getting bored!
Slowpokes...
I've gotta say, the view here is pretty nice. A bit cold for my tastes though, hehe~
Oops, sorry about that~ You see, this commander was spacing out on the way here!
Eh...? It's my fault?
Haha... Seeing as how everyone is here, why don't we discuss the battle plan?
Umm... Are you two the only ones here from the Northern Parliament?
Ahaha... It's a bit embarrassing to admit, but the others are still tied up by some unfinished business in the Arctics...
Since the stronghold won't initiate any external attacks, we'll join you for the first phase of this operation.
Our other comrades will link up with us after they get here.
You know... nothing creeps me out more than when the Sirens are sitting there *not* doing anything...
